AgentOS Project Context

Description:
This file provides a concise, link-first map of the repo for LLMs and agents.

Key Docs:
- README: /README.md
- Architecture: /docs/ARCHITECTURE.md
- API: /docs/API.md
- Runbook: /docs/RUNBOOK.md
- Security: /policies/security-baseline.md
- No-hardcode: /policies/no-hardcode.md

Agents:
- Orchestrator: /agents/orchestrator.md
- Security Guardian: /agents/security_guardian.md
- Backend: /agents/backend.md
- Automation: /agents/automation.md
- Docs: /agents/docs.md

Skills:

- Catalog: /skills/

Playbooks:
